title: Bivariate Choropleth Map
sourceText: Diabetes and obesity prevalence by county, 2013 - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

properties.description: The outer width of the chart, in pixels.
The outer height of the chart, in pixels.
The group names of the x and y value elements.
The labels for the color legend and tooltip.
The fill colors for the legend based on the labels variable array.  The length of colors MUST match the labels variable^2
The background color of the tooltip.
The text color of the tooltip.
The color of the state outlines.
The scale factor of the legend
